books.description: The daughter of survivalists, who is kept out of school, educates herself enough to leave home for university. 12 hours, 10 minutes unabridged. Read by Julia Whelan.
books.title: EDUCATED

books.description: The comedian recounts growing up in South Central Los Angeles and finding success after a period of homelessness. 6 hours, 29 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.

books.author: Seth Meyerowitz with Peter F Stevens
books.contributor: by Seth Meyerowitz with Peter F. Stevens
books.description: During World War II, an American airman is shot down over France and eludes the Gestapo for more than six months. 9 hours, 36 minutes unabridged. Read by Jonathan Todd Ross.
books.title: THE LOST AIRMAN

books.description: A straightforward, easy-to-understand introduction to the universe. 3 hours, 41 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.

books.description: The former secretary of state examines the legacy of fascism and its potential revival. 9 hours, 53 minutes unabridaged. Read by the author.

books.author: Masaji Ishikawa
books.description: A 13-year-old boy’s family moves from Japan to North Korea, where he spends 36 difficult years under the country’s regime. 5 hours, 54 minutes unabridged. Read by Brian Nishii.

books.author: Daniel Kahneman
books.description: When we can and cannot trust our intuitions in making business and personal decisions. 20 hours, 2 minutes unabridged. Read by Patrick Egan.

books.description: A look at our biases and the argument for why the world is in a better state than we might think. 8 hours, 51 minutes unabridged. Read by Richard Harries.
